activities: Personal information collected and used in connection with business activities of Xilinx, Inc. and its affiliates, including information concerning prospective, current and former customers, suppliers and vendors, partners and resellers.  Personal information relating to prospective, current and former Xilinx employees, contractors, consultants or other workers, in the context of work relationships with Xilinx (human resources data).
corpofftitle1: Senior VP, General Counsel, Chief Compliance Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
For complaints concerning organization human resources data, Xilinx commits to cooperate with the relevant European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs), Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), or their authorized representatives.
For complaints concerning all other data, Xilinx commits to the BBB EU Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Program.
